message.content: The plaintiff claims to have an oral agreement with the defendant's company for a monthly salary and unpaid wages, and has provided evidence such as ID card, promotional sales records, work sign-in sheets, and witness testimony. It is important to investigate the company's policies and regulations regarding part-time employees to determine the validity of the plaintiff's claims.
